mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reboard WHERE isshow = 'Y'

SELECT bno, id, body, wdate, avatar, step FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno, bno, id, body, wdate, avatar, step FROM ( SELECT rbno bno, id, body, wdate, savename avatar, (level -1) step FROM reboard r, member m, avatar a WHERE rbmno = mno AND avt = ano AND r.isshow = 'Y' START WITH upno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR rbno = upno ORDER SIBLINGS BY wdate DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
SELECT mno, id, savename avatar FROM member, avatar WHERE avt = ano AND id = #{id}
SELECT mno, savename avatar, rbno upno, body FROM member, avatar, reboard WHERE avt = ano AND id = #{id} AND rbno = #{bno}
SELECT id, mno, savename avatar, rbno bno, body, wdate FROM member m, avatar a, reboard r WHERE avt = ano AND mno = rbmno AND rbno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE reboard SET body = #{body}, wdate = sysdate WHERE rbno = #{bno}
UPDATE reboard SET isshow = 'N' WHERE rbno IN ( SELECT rbno FROM reboard WHERE isshow = 'Y' START WITH rbno = #{bno} CONNECT BY PRIOR rbno = upno )
